name: Save new Google Cloud Pub/Sub messages in Google Sheets
description: Every time a new message is received by Google Cloud Pub/Sub, Make will automatically keep track of the data in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ayFkaaUHjLXNbMlxwvpSDrOI8urfXNsYWcgRhzk_7pY/edit?usp=sharing).
